update sale_main_data set cus_name = #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, seen_policymaker = #{seenPolicymaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, policymaker_position = #{policymakerPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, done_policymaker = #{donePolicymaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, done_policymaker_position = #{donePolicymakerPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_real = #{isReal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_real_comment = #{isRealComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, five_user_up = #{fiveUserUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, five_user_up_comment = #{fiveUserUpComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_name = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_email = #{contactEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cus_emp_num = #{cusEmpNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cus_city = #{cusCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, launch_time = #{launchTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, close_time = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, next_policymaker_action = #{nextPolicymakerAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, next_req_action = #{nextReqAction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, true_close_time = #{trueCloseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uploads = #{uploads,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assign = #{assign,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select m.id,m.cus_name,m.begin_date,m.update_date,m.seen_policymaker, m.policymaker_position,m.done_policymaker,m.done_policymaker_position, m.is_real,m.is_real_comment,m.five_user_up,m.five_user_up_comment, m.contact_name,m.contact_phone,m.contact_email,m.important_req, m.cus_emp_num,m.cus_city,m.launch_time,m.close_time,m.next_policymaker_action, m.next_req_action,m.true_close_time,m.status,m.log_info, u.name as uploads , u2.name as assign from sale_main_data m left join sale_login_user u on m.uploads = u.id left join sale_login_user u2 on m.assign = u2.id order by m.begin_date desc
mapper.update: UPDATE sale_main_data SET status=#{1} WHERE id=#{0}
